title: What is the gold lining around a spell?
body:
While playing there may be a gold lining around a spell. If I try to use it, it just says it's not ready. Though this can go on through the game. Why?
-Thanks for your help!

replies.body:
Hmmmm it kind of sounds like you might have been hit by some kind of CC like a stun or disable that was preventing you from using that spell. 

I'm actually rather curious to know exactly what was going on! If that happens again, try to grab a quick screenshot and shoot it my way so we can take a look at that!
